Package nnsec.client

Provides the classes necessary to exploit the NNSec Protocol (or rather, Neural Network Secure Protocol).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CalculatorIFace CalculatorIFace interface contains methods that will be exported to the remote users.
 

Class Summary
Calculator Calculator is the class that client pass to the server (as a remote reference) so that the server can use this class to compute some values that it is not able to compute himself.
Client Client side GUI.
CommModule This class implements the related interface to turn himself into a remote class, so that users can export remote instances of CommModule.
 

Exception Summary
Calculator.ProtocolException Exception thrown when trying to exploit the protocol, and then some errors occur.
Calculator.UnsupportedFunctionException Exception thrown when trying to ask for a function, and then this function doesn't exist.
Client.ClientException Exception thrown when trying to exploit the protocol, and then some errors occur.
CommModule.ConnectionException Exception thrown when trying to connect to the server, and then some errors occur.
 

Package nnsec.client Description

Provides the classes necessary to exploit the NNSec Protocol (or rather, Neural Network Secure Protocol).

This subpackage contains client side related classes such as client's GUI and the modules used for the communication session.

Since:
1.0
